title: Oof!

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: honestly rito you guys are living memes

replies.body: The reason for that is a Rioter gets punched in the gut every time that error occurs.

How do you select the Rioter in question? Do you go by ranking order, seniority, or on rotation? 

These are important questions.
It goes by order of inconvenience. So a Rioter standing with a tray in the lunch line or giving a big presentation is more likely to receive the punch than one sitting at their desk.

> [{quoted}](name=Bark Wahlberg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Z95U1uaf,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-17T17:37:39.151+0000)
>
> It goes by order of inconvenience. So a Rioter standing with a tray in the lunch line or giving a big presentation is more likely to receive the punch than one sitting at their desk.


Riot has a monopoly on the meme machine. Production is going smoothly, as planned. 

"Turn Taric INTO a Car."

Somewhere out there, Lyte's jimmies are being rustled as he attempts to navigate the sea of troll Reddit comments in hopes of finding 1 person who actually enjoys dynamic queues. What he doesn't know, unfortunately, is that dynamic queue is already kill and someone has added "Riot Lyte" as a submission to www.knowyourmeme.com already. It's only a matter of time before he's confirmed.

FeelsDynamicMan
whut? i thought reactions to dq were generally positive. everyone i've talked to likes them
